name: Puggle
description:
Another game I decided to make to try out some of the coding practices I've learned so far from Uni!

The rules are simple:

  • Points are rewarded based on how high you hit the balls
  • Overtime more balls will spawn for you to juggle with
  • Score as high as possible
  • Game end when you lost all of your lives or when there are no balls on screen

Extra thing, the code to this game is on GitHub! Take a look if you're curious or want to roast my coding.
